alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 11 at 6:49AM EDT until July 12 at 6:20AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive runoff continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southern Vermont, including the following areas, Bennington, Eastern Windham and Western Windham. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Area creeks and streams are running high. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Even though the majority of the rain has ended, river rises are still possible due to lingering runoff and water routing. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued. Do not enter or cross flowing water or water of unknown depth.
